6: the clang of hammer on metal
8: the scrape of bread bieng pulled from an oven
10: a horse whinnying at a hitch
12: a boot tapping to an unheard beat
14: a broom sweeping a stone doorstep
16: a man quietly whistling to himself
17: a mason slapping mortar onto bricks
20: a saw gliding through a board
21: the slow creaking of an old rocking chair
22: distant song from a tavern window
23: a door creaking on rusted hinges
26: a bell jingling as a door opens
31: a mortar grinding herbs in a pestal
